Articles.Content: Is there a mod that either adds decouplers that only function manually or by custom/abort action groups, or a mod that allows you to disable certain parts from staging?
In the editor the right click menu for decouplers and a few other staged parts (fairings?) allows you to turn off staging.

1 hour ago, wasml said:

In the editor the right click menu for decouplers and a few other staged parts (fairings?) allows you to turn off staging.

Only if advanced tweakables is on.

 

1 hour ago, mr. engino said:

Is there a mod that either adds decouplers that only function manually or by custom/abort action groups, or a mod that allows you to disable certain parts from staging?

Advanced tweakables in your game settings will let you do that.  Lets you shut off staging for decouplers and fairings.
Advanced tweakables is one of the first things I turn on in a new install - I forget that I have it on and that other may not - thanks for clarifying.
